set-cell-horizontal-alignment-left.label: Align left
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-left.description: Align the content of the current cell to its left.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-right.label: Align right
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-right.description: Align the content of the current cell to its right.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-center.label: Align center
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-center.description: Center the content of the current cell.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-justify.label: Justify
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-justify.description: Justify the content of the current cell.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-top.label: Align top
set-cell-vertical-alignment-top.description: Align the content of the current cell to its top.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-bottom.label: Align bottom
set-cell-vertical-alignment-bottom.description: Align the content of the current cell to its bottom.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-center.label: Align center
set-cell-vertical-alignment-center.description: Align the content of the current cell to its center.
